title: YOU'RE NOT LOGGED IN
content:
You must login to be able to use the full functionality of the website, all of this data is dummy and not real.
It's just for demonstration purposes

title: Hello Students
content: Welcome to a wonderful year full of learning! Enjoy each day and know that you are surrounded by support. Try your best in everything you do, stay positive, have fun, and keep smiling! You’ll do great!
